attributes.action: Give tax incentive to haulage companies who only operate during night time hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime objective of this, would encourage more haulage companies to operate outside of daylight hours thus reducing the current daylight congestion on today’s roads. This would negate the requirement of upgrading roads as capacity would be spread over a 24hr period on not the current 12hr period.
